snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio proposes shelters in the neighborhoods that homeless people come from. Council members say they should be distributed across the city. Cue showdown....

headline.main: David Rubinger, 92, Photographer Who Chronicled Israeli History, Dies
headline.print_headline: David Rubinger, Who Captured Israeli History, Dies at 92

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio proposes shelters in the neighborhoods that homeless people come from. Council members say they should be distributed across the city. Cue showdown.
